name: .SDO File Extension
summary: Learn about .SDO files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Document created by Signere.no, a secure signature database; contains a signed document that indicates who signed it and when the signature was written; can be viewed through their portal or downloaded from Signere.no.

content: Signere.no provides electronic credentials through their secure online signing service. Documents and agreements can be signed with Bank ID and sent through their portal or task system. The Bank ID can confirm your identity and sign any documents you have.
NOTE: Signere.no Document Viewer is no longer available for download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
